00487 inline CIntImage::RowIterator CIntImage::Row(UINT32 i)
00488 {
00489         return RowIterator(m_Image.ppAllScanLines[i+m_Image.Origo.y],GetMinX()+m_Image.Origo.x, GetMaxX()+m_Image.Origo.x);
00490 }
00491 
00492 inline CIntImage::ConstRowIterator CIntImage::ConstRow(UINT32 i) const
00493 {
00494         return ConstRowIterator(m_Image.ppAllScanLines[i+m_Image.Origo.y],GetMinX()+m_Image.Origo.x, GetMaxX()+m_Image.Origo.x);
00495 }
00496 
00497 inline CIntImage::ColumnIterator CIntImage::Column(UINT32 i)
00498 {
00499         return ColumnIterator(i+m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMinY()+m_Image.Origo.y],
00500                                                 m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMaxY()+m_Image.Origo.y-1]-m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(INT16),
00501                                                 m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(INT16));
00502 }
00503 
00504 inline CIntImage::ConstColumnIterator CIntImage::ConstColumn(UINT32 i) const
00505 {
00506         return ConstColumnIterator(i+m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMinY()+m_Image.Origo.y],
00507                                                 m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMaxY()+m_Image.Origo.y-1]-m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(INT16),
00508                                                 m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(INT16));

00511 inline bool CIntImage::IsEmpty() const
00512 {
00513         return (m_Image.pPixelStream==NULL);
00514 }
00515 
00516 inline INT16 CIntImage::GetPixel(int x, int y) const
00517 {
00518         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00519         /* adjust origo offset */
00520         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00521         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00522 
00523         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00524                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00525         {
00526                 return m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x];
00527         }
00528         else
00529         {
00530                 ostringstream ost;
00531                 ost << "CIntImage::GetPixel(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00532                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00533                 return 0;
00534         }
00535 }
00536 
00537 inline INT16 CIntImage::GetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos) const
00538 {
00539         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00540         /* adjust origo offset */
00541         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00542         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00543 
00544         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00545                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00546         {
00547                 return m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x];
00548         }
00549         else
00550         {
00551                 ostringstream ost;
00552                 ost << "CIntImage::GetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00553                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00554                 return 0;
00555         }
00556 }

00569         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00570 
00571         return m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x];
00572 }
00573 
00574 inline float CIntImage::GetPixelInterpolated(float x,float y) const
00575 {
00576         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00577         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00578 
00579         if((x>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+m_Image.BorderSize-1) &&
00580                 (y>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+m_Image.BorderSize-1))
00581         {
00582                 // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00583                 int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00584                 int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00585                 // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00586                 int xh = xl + 1;
00587                 int yh = yl + 1;
00588                 // do bilinear interpolation
00589                 return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(float)xl))*((float)yh-y) +
00590                  (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(float)xl))*(y-(float)yl));
00591         }
00592         else
00593         {
00594                 ostringstream ost;
00595                 ost << "CIntImage::GetPixelInterpolated(" << x << "," << y << 
00596                         ") Needs to access pixels outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00597                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00598                 return -1;
00599         }
00600 }
00601 
00602 inline float CIntImage::GetPixelInterpolated(const CPoint2D<float>& Pos) const
00603 {
00604         float x=Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00605         float y=Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00606 
00607         if((x>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+m_Image.BorderSize-1) &&
00608                 (y>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+m_Image.BorderSize-1))
00609         {
00610                 // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00611                 int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00612                 int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00613                 // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00614                 int xh = xl + 1;
00615                 int yh = yl + 1;
00616                 // do bilinear interpolation
00617                 return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(float)xl))*((float)yh-y) +
00618                  (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(float)xl))*(y-(float)yl));
00619         }
00620         else
00621         {
00622                 ostringstream ost;
00623                 ost << "CIntImage::GetPixelInterpolated" << Pos << 
00624                         " Needs to access pixels outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00625                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00626                 return -1;
00627         }
00628 }
00629 
00630 inline float CIntImage::GetPixelInterpolatedFast(float x,float y) const
00631 {
00632         // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00633         int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00634         int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00635         // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00636         int xh = xl + 1;
00637         int yh = yl + 1;
00638         // do bilinear interpolation
00639         return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(float)xl))*((float)yh-y) +
00640          (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(float)xl))*(y-(float)yl));
00641 }
00642 
00643 inline float CIntImage::GetPixelInterpolatedFast(const CPoint2D<float>& Pos) const
00644 {
00645         float x=Pos.GetX();
00646         float y=Pos.GetY();
00647         int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00648         int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00649         // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00650         int xh = xl + 1;
00651         int yh = yl + 1;
00652         // do bilinear interpolation
00653         return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(float)xl))*((float)yh-y) +
00654          (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(float)xl))*(y-(float)yl));
00655 }

00657 inline bool CIntImage::SetPixel(int x, int y, INT16 Color)
00658 {
00659         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00660         /* adjust origo offset */
00661         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00662         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00663 
00664         if((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00665                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00666         {
00667                 m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=Color;
00668                 return true;
00669         }
00670         else
00671         {
00672                 ostringstream ost;
00673                 ost << "CIntImage::SetPixel(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00674                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00675                 return false;
00676         }
00677 }
00678 
00679 inline bool CIntImage::SetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, INT16 Color)
00680 {
00681         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00682         /* adjust origo offset */
00683         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00684         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00685 
00686         if((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00687                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00688         {
00689                 m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=Color;
00690                 return true;
00691         }
00692         else
00693         {
00694                 ostringstream ost;
00695                 ost << "CIntImage::GetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00696                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00697                 return false;
00698         }
00699 }

00737 inline int CIntImage::GetMinX() const
00738 {
00739         if (ROIActive()==true)
00740                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetX();
00741         else
00742                 return -m_Image.Origo.x;
00743 }
00744 
00745 inline int CIntImage::GetMinY() const
00746 {
00747         if (ROIActive()==true)
00748                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetY();
00749         else
00750                 return -m_Image.Origo.y;
00751 }
00752 
00753 inline int CIntImage::GetMaxX() const
00754 {
00755         if (ROIActive()==true)
00756                 return m_ROILowerRight.GetX();
00757         else
00758                 return m_Image.Width-m_Image.Origo.x;
00759 }
00760 
00761 inline int CIntImage::GetMaxY() const
00762 {
00763         if (ROIActive()==true)
00764                 return m_ROILowerRight.GetY();
00765         else
00766                 return m_Image.Height-m_Image.Origo.y;
00767 }
00768 
00769 inline CPoint2D<int> CIntImage::GetOrigo() const
00770 {
00771         return CPoint2D<int>(m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.Origo.x);
00772 }
00773 
00774 inline ORIGIN CIntImage::GetOrigin() const
00775 {
00776         // get the origin of image
00777         return m_Image.Origin;
00778 }
00779 
00780 inline void CIntImage::SetOrigo(UINT16 x, UINT16 y)
00781 {
00782         SetOrigo(CPoint2D<int>(x,y));
00783 }
00784 
00785 inline void CIntImage::SetOrigo(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos)
00786 {
00787         m_Image.Origo.x=Pos.GetX();
00788         m_Image.Origo.y=Pos.GetY();
00789         if (m_ROIActive==true)
00790         {
00791                 m_ROIUpperLeft  -= Pos;
00792                 m_ROILowerRight -= Pos;
00793         }
00794 }
00795 
00796 inline bool CIntImage::SetROI(const CPoint2D<INT32>& UL, const CPoint2D<INT32>& LR)
00797 {
00798         if ((UL.GetX()>=LR.GetX()) || (UL.GetY()>=LR.GetY()))
00799         {
00800                 ostringstream ost;
00801                 ost << "CIntImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " greater than LR " << LR << 
00802                         " in at least one of the dimensions" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00803                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00804                 return false;
00805         }
00806         // we check with the MinX, MaxX, MinY and MaxY without ROI
00807         INT32 MinXNoROI=-m_Image.Origo.x;
00808         INT32 MinYNoROI=-m_Image.Origo.y;
00809         INT32 MaxXNoROI=m_Image.Width-m_Image.Origo.x;
00810         INT32 MaxYNoROI=m_Image.Height-m_Image.Origo.y;
00811         if ((UL.GetX()<MinXNoROI) || (UL.GetY()<MinYNoROI) || 
00812                     (LR.GetX()>MaxXNoROI) || (LR.GetY()>MaxYNoROI))
00813         {
00814                 ostringstream ost;
00815                 ost << "CIntImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " or LR " << LR << 
00816                         " outside image dimensions: " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMinX(),GetMinY()) <<
00817                         " - " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMaxX(),GetMaxY()) << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00818                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00819                 return false;
00820         }
00821         m_ROIActive=true;
00822         m_ROIUpperLeft=UL;
00823         m_ROILowerRight=LR;
00824         return true;
00825 }
00826 
00827 } // end namespace ipl
